entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 10:09 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
